CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK("/a9Y/e?00N1300000B8CbY="&ArticleNumber&"&00N1300000B8Cbg="&Id&"&00N1300000B8Cba="&Title&"&CF00N1300000B8CbT_lkid="&CreatedById&"&CF00N1300000B8CbT="&CreatedBy.Full_Name__c&"&CF00N1300000B8Cbc_lkid="&CreatedBy.KCS_Coach__r.Id&"&CF00N1300000B8Cbc="&CreatedBy.KCS_Coach__r.Full_Name__c&"&00N1300000B8Cbf="& text(month(today()))&"/"&text(day(today()))&"/"&text(year(today()))&" "&IF( OR( VALUE( MID( TEXT(now()+17), 12, 2 ) ) = 0, VALUE( MID( TEXT(now()+17), 12, 2 ) ) = 12 ), "12", TEXT( VALUE( MID( TEXT(now()+17), 12, 2 ) ) - IF( VALUE( MID( TEXT(now()+17), 12, 2 ) ) < 12, 0, 12 ) ) ) & ":" & MID( TEXT(now()+17), 15, 2 ) & " " & IF( VALUE( MID( TEXT(now()+17), 12, 2 ) ) < 12, "AM", "PM" ) &"&retURL=articles/Knowledge_Article/"&UrlName,"Create New AQI")
CustomField.label: Create New AQI
